body_html:
I think this is why this webpage show 404 error?
I just wrote a program that user "ValidationMonitor " to implement early stopping, even though this class is in contrib but it still works fine, why delete the documentation?

body:
I think this is why this [webpage](https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/monitors) show 404 error?
I just wrote a program that user "ValidationMonitor " to implement early stopping, even though this class is in contrib  but it still works fine, why delete the documentation?
